mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sample (sample_id, sample_code, sample_name, sample_country, sample_type, sample_mate, sample_seed, sample_amount, sample_sprout, sample_purity, sample_comment, create_date, modify_date) VALUES (#{sample_id}, #{sample_code}, #{sample_name}, #{sample_country}, #{sample_type}, #{sample_mate}, #{sample_seed}, #{sample_amount}, #{sample_sprout}, #{sample_purity}, #{sample_comment}, NOW(), NOW())
